sentences.en: Create and maintain ELK spare part list and documentation.
sentences.cn: 创建和更新零备件清单和文件.

sentences.en: I covered the elk with a tarp and sat down near it, wrapping myself in blankets.
sentences.cn: 我用一块防水布盖住了麋鹿，然后用毯子把自己裹起来，坐在它旁边。
我看到一只文雅的麋鹿.

sentences.en: I was close enough to the elk to hear its labored breathing.
sentences.cn: 我离那头麋鹿非常近，能听见它吃力的呼吸声。

sentences.en: In the animal world, similar diseases occur in mink, mule deer, and elk.
sentences.cn: 在动物世界, 类似的疾病在水貂 、 骡鹿和麋鹿中也发生过.

sentences.en: It had an estimated elk this season.
sentences.cn: 据估测这个季节大约有7000头麋鹿.

sentences.en: It was quite an Elk night.
sentences.cn: 真是我们兄弟会的盛会.

sentences.en: Look carefully at an elk's appearance.
sentences.cn: 你呀,仔细看看麋鹿的样子.

sentences.en: Now back, established the milu deer dafeng elk nature reserve.
sentences.cn: 现麋鹿回国后, 建立了大丰麋鹿自然保护区.

sentences.en: Picture 2, Elk Grove Chinese Association 10 th anniversary cake.
sentences.cn: 图二:为庆祝麋鹿林华人联谊会成立十周年特制的蛋糕.

sentences.en: The refuge contains the largest wintering population of elk in the world.
sentences.cn: 这座庇护所有着世界上数量最大的冬季麋鹿群.

sentences.en: They are also home to various wildlife, including bison, elk , coyotes, and prairie dogs.
sentences.cn: 它们也是各式野生动物的家乡, 包括北美野牛 、 美洲赤鹿 、 郊狼及草原土拨鼠.

sentences.en: They hunted the buffalo, deer, elk, rabbits and many other animals which lived in the grasslands.
sentences.cn: 他们射猎水牛, 鹿, 麋鹿, 兔子和许多其他的动物,并生活在这片大草原上.

sentences.en: This is the Dafeng Elk Nature Reserve.
sentences.cn: 组员:这儿就是大丰的麋鹿自然保护区.

sentences.en: To the north, ELK Mountain is another well - known landmark, about 100 miles distant.
sentences.cn: 在北边, 埃尔克山脉是另一处著名的风光, 大约有100英里远.

sentences.en: Welcome to the Elk Grove Chinese Association Photography Club Webpage.
sentences.cn: 欢迎来到糜鹿林华人联谊会摄影小组网页.

sentences.en: When the elk got up, the tarp slid off.
sentences.cn: 麋鹿站起来的时候，防水布从它身上滑落。

words.tran_cn: 麋鹿；软鞣粗皮；驼鹿皮革

trans.tran_en: a very large brown North American, European, and Asian animal with wide flat horns
